Frequently Asked Questions
What is a Unified Inbox, and how does it help?
A unified inbox brings all customer messages from platforms like WhatsApp, Facebook, Instagram, and Telegram into one place. It allows you to manage conversations easily, respond faster, and engage with customers without switching between apps.
How can I manage Online Live Chat from multiple platforms?
With our chatbot’s unified inbox, you can handle live chats from various platforms—your website, Facebook, or WhatsApp—all from a single dashboard. This keeps everything organized and ensures you never miss a customer query.
How does the Unified Inbox improve response times?
The unified inbox consolidates all your customer interactions into one place, helping you quickly respond to messages without hopping between platforms.
Can I respond to Facebook and Instagram messages in real-time using the Unified Inbox?
Yes! With the unified inbox, you can manage and respond to all your Facebook and Instagram messages in real-time, including comments and direct messages. This helps you stay connected and engage with your audience without switching apps.
Is the Unified Inbox useful for customer support on WhatsApp?
Absolutely! The unified inbox makes it easy to provide live chat support to your customers on WhatsApp. You can handle multiple conversations, resolve issues faster, and even use it for marketing campaigns—all from one place.
